content.question: Find the interval of convergence of the power series <math> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mi>ln</mi> <mi>n</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> </math>. Show the analysis that leads to your answer.

frqParts.text: Find the interval of convergence of the power series <math> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mi>ln</mi> <mi>n</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> </math>. Show the analysis that leads to your answer.

topic.text: 10.13: (BC ONLY) Radius and Interval of Convergence of Power Series

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
